frontmatter.title: pltr
frontmatter.lede: Browser extension which tells you the progress of the page as you scroll through it

frontmatter.title: Twitter topic modelling
frontmatter.lede: Topic modelling on twitter user profiles. Categorises user's tweet based on Bayesian algorithm.

frontmatter.title: pydo
frontmatter.lede: Terminal accessible to-do list manager. Stores the tasks even after the session changes.

frontmatter.title: Python mathJS API
frontmatter.lede: Python wrapper for the popular math library Math.js. Added extra support for string numerals

frontmatter.title: Facebook notification RSS
frontmatter.lede: A private RSS feed for user's Facebook notifications. Needs Facebook OAuth to authenticate.

frontmatter.title: Announcement Informer
frontmatter.lede: Linux desktop notification app which keeps user up to date with the latest announcement of the university.

frontmatter.title: Chrome Page Speed Insights Extension
frontmatter.lede: Check PageSpeed Insights score of the web page with a single click. Used by over thousand users worldwide.

frontmatter.title: GPA Calculator
frontmatter.lede: GPA calculator to simplify the process of calculating GPA for the students of SRM University.

frontmatter.title: Foodoh
frontmatter.lede: A food recommender system which takes in food preference of user and recommends the best restaurant nearby.

frontmatter.title: Semantic search engine on Wikipedia
frontmatter.lede: Information retrieval system on Wikipedia corpus from DBPedia RDF dumps.

frontmatter.title: itlo
frontmatter.lede: A Slack bot which helps SRM SE teammates in checking the status of the lab
